text: Sheila Margaret MacRae (n√©e Stephens; 24 September 1921 - 6 March 2014) was an English actress, dancer, producer and singer. She was best known on television for her role as Alice Kramden in the 1960s version of The Honeymooners. She also appeared in movies such as Pretty Baby (1950), Caged (1950), Backfire (1950) and Sex and the Single Girl (1964). She was born in London. MacRae died from natural causes on 6 March 2014. She was 92 years old. She was survived by her children two children with actor Gordon MacRae. She was predeceased by two other children with MacRae, one of which was the actress Meredith MacRae. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:English dancers Category:English movie actors Category:English singers Category:English television actors Category:English movie producers
title: Sheila MacRae
